projects.name: Compiler Forge Toolkit
projects.title: Web-Based Compiler Design Utility
projects.description: A web-based toolkit to simplify and accelerate learning in compiler design.
projects.briefDescription: The Compiler Forge Toolkit allows students and educators to instantly compute critical compiler construction components like Left Recursion Elimination, Left Factoring, and First & Follow Sets. Designed for quick, accurate results, it reduces manual effort and errors in compiler design exercises.
challenges: Designing an intuitive UI for technical compiler operations
Accurately implementing grammar parsing algorithms in JavaScript

projects.name: FoodOShare
projects.title: Community Food Sharing Platform
projects.description: A platform to connect communities and reduce food waste by sharing surplus food.
projects.briefDescription: FoodOShare helps communities reduce food waste by connecting people who have surplus food with those who need it. The platform supports secure authentication, item listing, and easy sharing to promote a sustainable lifestyle.
challenges: Integrating real-time data fetching with TanStack Query
Ensuring a smooth and responsive UI across devices
improvements: Add chat feature for donors and recipients

projects.name: Boardium
projects.title: Class-wise Notice Management WebApp
projects.description: A web app for managing and delivering class-wise notices efficiently.
projects.briefDescription: Boardium is a notice management web app tailored for class-wise distribution, enabling fast and organized communication between teachers and students.
challenges: Creating an easy-to-use notice publishing system
Maintaining secure and fast real-time updates

projects.name: Book Nookery
projects.title: Java-based Book Store Management Software
projects.description: A desktop application for managing bookstore operations.
projects.briefDescription: Book Nookery is a Java-based software for efficient bookstore management, covering inventory tracking, sales management, and customer records.
challenges: Designing a smooth MySQL integration for Java desktop app
Implementing a user-friendly UI for non-technical users
improvements: Enable cloud sync for multi-device access

projects.name: DevBoard
projects.title: Developer Tools Showcase
projects.description: A collection of developer resources and tools.
projects.briefDescription: DevBoard is a static website showcasing a curated list of developer tools and resources in a clean, responsive layout.
challenges: Organizing multiple resources into a clean UI
Ensuring full responsiveness with Tailwind CSS

projects.name: Uni-Chronicle
projects.title: Automated Academic File Management Shell Tool
projects.description: A shell-script automation tool for organizing university academic files.
projects.briefDescription: Uni-Chronicle automates academic file organization for theory and lab courses, manages backups, and optimizes student workflow on Ubuntu systems.
challenges: Designing automation scripts compatible with multiple directory structures
Scheduling automated backups with Cron jobs
improvements: Add cross-platform support for Windows and macOS
